Text:
Thank you so much YIFY Team 

A/V: 10

Audio =Zero actually. He has no clue people  have 5.1 home theatres and like to use them. either that or he just has no clue how to encode in 5.1. It's quite easy, even I know how to do it and I'm no expert. One of the worst encoders out. Thankfully there are decent encoders who do encode 5.1 DDigital and DTS. But i guess YIFI doesn't have a 5.1 system, doesn't care or just doesn't have very discerning hearing. Downvoting as usual :) Thanks.
Thanks YIFY. Quality is good. Acting OK. Slightly predictable in parts but worth the watch.
